text: Set It Off is an American punk/rock band formed in 2008 in Tampa, Florida. They gained popularity on lead vocalist Cody Carsonâ€™s YouTube channel. 3 of the band albums made it to the Billboard 200 chart. The band members are Cody Carson (vocals, guitar), Zach Dewall (guitar, vocals), Austin Kerr (bass, vocals), Maxx Danziger (drums) and Dan Clermont (synth, vocals). In 2015, Austin Kerr was removed from the band after sexual assault allegations he addressed. title: Set It Off (band)
